Sustain management excellence.     After a briefing regarding the Manhattan Project, Nobel Laureate Niels Bohr said to physicist Edward Teller, “I told you it couldn’t be done without turning the whole country into a factory.” Of course, the state of Ohio didn’t need to be turned into a factory, since by that time it already had a long history of industrialization.
